resources.string:
Fast Numbers is a 2 player game where each player is given 2 numbers to choose from. 

 There are two types of game modes: 
 Greater Than: If this game mode is selected then the player must choose the larger number to score points 
 Less Than: If this game mode is selected then the player must choose the smaller number to score points 

 Each wrong selection causes the player to lose 3 points 

 Game is finished after a duration which can be set from the game settings 

 There are two types of high scores: 

 Individual : Only single player highest score 
 Combined : Highest score in a single match combining both players scores
